Medications.MedDescription: Commonly used medicine to treat pain and reduce high temperature
Commonly used medicine to treat stomach pain
Medications.Instructions: Take every 60min until you feel better

Medications.MedDescription: Commonly used medicine to treat or prevent bronchospasm in patients with asthma
Medications.Instructions: Take in with nebulizer 3 to 4 times per day

Medications.MedDescription: Commonly used medicine to treat cold and flu
Medications.Instructions: Take 2 capsules with water every 4 hours.
